  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x92
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x92
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x68
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 184x19
          text run at (0,0) width 184: "There should be no red below."
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,36) size 80x32 [bgcolor=#FF0000]
        LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 80x16 [bgcolor=#0000FF]
